players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I'm shocked Alice is gone. We need to be careful and share any info we have."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. Diana, we need to vote him out."
You: "I'm the detective! Charlie is lying. I investigated Diana last night and she's the mafioso. Vote Charlie for trying to frame me."
Charlie: "Bob is lying. I'm the detective and my investigation clearly shows he is mafia. Diana, please vote with me to eliminate Bob."
